---
title: "Parameters Reference"

## Location

All parameters are defined in: **`single-facility.rs/parameters.xml`**

## Disease Parameters

### Transmission

| Parameter | Default | Range | Description |
|-----------|---------|-------|-------------|
| `longTermAcuteCareBeta` | 0.0615 | 0.0 - 1.0 | Transmission rate coefficient per contact |
| `isolationEffectiveness` | 0.5 | 0.0 - 1.0 | Multiplier for beta when patient isolated (0.5 = 50% reduction) |

### Importation

| Parameter | Default | Range | Description |
|-----------|---------|-------|-------------|
| `importationRate` | 0.206 | 0.0 - 1.0 | Probability new admits arrive colonized |

### Decolonization

| Parameter | Default | Range | Description |
|-----------|---------|-------|-------------|
| `avgDecolonizationTime` | 387 | > 0 | Mean time (days) for spontaneous clearance |

### Clinical Detection

| Parameter | Default | Range | Description |
|-----------|---------|-------|-------------|
| `avgTimeToClinicDetection` | varies | > 0 | Mean time (days) to clinical detection |

## Surveillance Parameters

### Testing Intervals

| Parameter | Default | Range | Description |
|-----------|---------|-------|-------------|
| `daysBetweenTests` | 14 | > 0 | Interval (days) for periodic surveillance tests |

### Adherence Rates

| Parameter | Default | Range | Description |
|-----------|---------|-------|-------------|
| `admissionSurveillanceAdherence` | 0.911 | 0.0 - 1.0 | Compliance rate for admission testing |
| `midstaySurveillanceAdherence` | 0.954 | 0.0 - 1.0 | Compliance rate for periodic testing |

### Activation

| Parameter | Default | Range | Description |
|-----------|---------|-------|-------------|
| `doActiveSurveillanceAfterBurnIn` | true | true/false | Enable surveillance after burn-in period |

## Facility Parameters

### Admission

| Parameter | Default | Range | Description |
|-----------|---------|-------|-------------|
| `newPatientAdmissionRate` | (calculated) | > 0 | Admission rate (patients/time unit) |
| `avgPopTarget` | (facility-specific) | > 0 | Target average daily census |

### Length of Stay (LOS)

For Type 0 (LTAC) facilities, LOS uses a mixture distribution:

```
60% of admissions:
  - Shape: 7.6019666
  - Scale: 3.4195217

40% of admissions:
  - Shape: 1.2327910
  - Scale: 23.5214724
```

These parameters are hardcoded in `Facility.getRandomLOS()`

## Simulation Control

### Timing

| Parameter | Default | Description |
|-----------|---------|-------------|
| Burn-in duration | 3650 ticks | 10 years without measurement |
| Measurement period | 1825 ticks | 5 years with full output |
| Total duration | 5475 ticks | 15 years total |

### Batch Mode

| Parameter | Default | Description |
|-----------|---------|-------------|
| `isBatchRun` | false | true = suppress individual outputs, false = create CSV files |

## Output Control

### Individual Run Outputs

When `isBatchRun = false`, generates:

- `simulation_results.demo.txt` - Summary statistics
- `daily_population_stats.demo.txt` - Time series data
- `admissions.demo.txt` - Admission events
- `transmissions.demo.txt` - Transmission events
- `clinicalDetection.demo.txt` - Detection events
- `decolonization.demo.txt` - Decolonization events
- `surveillance.demo.txt` - Surveillance test results

### Batch Run Outputs

When `isBatchRun = true`, generates:

- Minimal output focused on summary statistics
- Parameter mappings for sweep identification
- Faster execution

## Example Configuration

### Default (Realistic Baseline)

```xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<Parameters>
    <!-- Disease -->
    <parameter name="longTermAcuteCareBeta" value="0.0615"/>
    <parameter name="importationRate" value="0.206"/>
    <parameter name="avgDecolonizationTime" value="387"/>
    <parameter name="isolationEffectiveness" value="0.5"/>

    <!-- Surveillance -->
    <parameter name="daysBetweenTests" value="14"/>
    <parameter name="admissionSurveillanceAdherence" value="0.911"/>
    <parameter name="midstaySurveillanceAdherence" value="0.954"/>
    <parameter name="doActiveSurveillanceAfterBurnIn" value="true"/>

    <!-- Facility -->
    <parameter name="avgPopTarget" value="300"/>
    <parameter name="newPatientAdmissionRate" value="1.0"/>

    <!-- Simulation -->
    <parameter name="isBatchRun" value="false"/>
</Parameters>
```

### High Transmission Scenario

```xml
<parameter name="longTermAcuteCareBeta" value="0.15"/>    <!-- 2.4x default -->
<parameter name="isolationEffectiveness" value="0.2"/>    <!-- Less effective isolation -->
<parameter name="avgDecolonizationTime" value="500"/>     <!-- Longer duration -->
```

### Intensive Surveillance Scenario

```xml
<parameter name="daysBetweenTests" value="7"/>            <!-- Weekly testing -->
<parameter name="admissionSurveillanceAdherence" value="0.99"/>
<parameter name="midstaySurveillanceAdherence" value="0.99"/>
<parameter name="doActiveSurveillanceAfterBurnIn" value="true"/>
```

### No Intervention Baseline

```xml
<parameter name="doActiveSurveillanceAfterBurnIn" value="false"/>
<parameter name="isolationEffectiveness" value="0"/>  <!-- No isolation benefit -->
<parameter name="avgDecolonizationTime" value="387"/> <!-- Natural only -->
```

## Batch Parameter Sweeps

For batch runs, use `single-facility.rs/batch_params.xml`:

```xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<batch>
    <parameter name="longTermAcuteCareBeta" type="range" from="0.03" to="0.15" step="0.03"/>
    <parameter name="importationRate" type="list">0.1, 0.206, 0.3</parameter>
    <parameter name="doActiveSurveillanceAfterBurnIn" type="list">true, false</parameter>

    <parameter name="isBatchRun" value="true"/>
</batch>
```

## Parameter Sensitivity

Key parameters for sensitivity analysis:

1. **High sensitivity**: `longTermAcuteCareBeta`, `importationRate`
2. **Medium sensitivity**: `daysBetweenTests`, `isolationEffectiveness`
3. **Lower sensitivity**: `avgDecolonizationTime`, adherence rates

See [Parameter Sensitivity Vignette](../vignettes/03-parameter-sensitivity.qmd) for empirical results.

## Units & Scales

All time-based parameters use **days**:

- `avgDecolonizationTime = 387` → 387 days = 1.06 years
- `daysBetweenTests = 14` → 14 days = 2 weeks
- `avgPopTarget = 300` → 300 patients (absolute count)

## Getting Started

1. Use default parameters in `single-facility.rs/parameters.xml`
2. Run [Basic Simulation](../vignettes/01-basic-simulation.qmd)
3. Explore changes to specific parameters
4. See [Parameter Sensitivity](../vignettes/03-parameter-sensitivity.qmd) for recommendations
